text: Ara smarana karuna, yedina amara pratyeka um'matera kache, tadera theke tadera'i birud'dhe ekajana saksi ut'thita karaba [1] ebam apanake amara tadera upara saksirupe niye asaba [2]. Ara amara apanara prati kitaba nayila karechi [3] pratyeka bisayera spasta byakhyasbarupa [4], pathanirdesa, daya o musalimadera jan'ya susambadasbarupa
